items.name: OpenModellica
items.description: Introduction OPENMODELICA is an open-source Modelica-based1 modeling and simulation environment intended for industrial and academic usage.

items.name: Eclipse Capella
items.description: Eclipse Capella is a powerful and extensible MBSE software tool that leverages a field-proven language and method to successfully design the architecture of complex systems.

items.name: Eclipse Papyrus
items.description: Eclipse Papyrus is an industrial-grade open source Model-Based Engineering tool. Eclipse Papyrus has notably been used successfuly in industrial projects and is the base platform for several industrial modeling tools.
